summary: This is a patch for Conan Sword, orginal modification has not been updated since 14 February 2012.And it is not compatible with 1.9.32.0.8 patch and contains a few bugs.Using Creation Kit and TES5Edit I fix it.I just corrected esp file and made all in one installer with optional textures, compatible with Wrye Bash and NMM.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][size=3]This is a patch for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4217]Conan Sword[/url], orginal modification has not been updated since 14 February 2012.
And it is not compatible with 1.9.32.0.8 patch and contains a few bugs.
Using Creation Kit and TES5Edit I fix it.
I just corrected esp file and made all in one installer with optional textures,
compatible with [font=Verdana]Wrye Bash[/font] and NMM.

Conan Sword requires now Skyrim 1.9.32.0.8 patch to work properly.

Other user's assets.
All the assets in this file belong to the author, or are from free-to-use modder's resources.
Authors:
cokla
avtor
RabidShark1
Rhevn
Mr. Dave[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3]
(If I have missed anyone it was not intentional. Let me know I'll fix it.)

[color=#FF9900]If you like what I did, go back and support.
This is the best way to thank me for my work.[/color]

[b][color=#ff7700]Install[/color][/b]

To install use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1840]Wrye Bash[/url] or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager/]Nexus Mod Manager[/url].


[b][color=#FF9900]My other modifications.[/color]
[size=3][size=3][size=3][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50737/?]Insane Armory - Archery Bows and Crossbows[/url][/size][/size][/size][/size][font=Verdana][size=3][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50737/?]
[/url][font=Verdana][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67828/?] Insane Armory - Shields[/url][/size][/font][/size][/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30282/?]Scoia'tael Bows[/url][/size][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50857/?]Insane Alchemy -  Potions Poisons and Others High Polygons Bottles[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30257/?]Helm of Oreyn Bearclaw - Light Cloth Enchanting Disenchant[/url][/b]

[color=#FF9900][b]Credits[/b]
[/color][url=http://bethsoft.com/en-gb]Bethesda[/url] [color=#ff7700]for creating games that can be modified.
>>> Unfortunately, this is becoming less common practice. <<<
>>> And instead, we get... ( Better to "create" next DLC ) <<<[/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25859]TES5Edit[/url] [color=#ff7700]great tool.
And all persons listed above.[/color][/size][/font][/center]

[center][size=3][color=#c80000][b]You CAN NOT use anything from My modification on website that makes money directly or through advertising.
>>> The only exception is www.nexusmods.com <<<
You CAN NOT use anything from My modification on Steam Workshop or Bethesda.net.[/b][/color][/size]
[size=3][color=#006400][b]In other cases for permission ask via PM.[/b][/color][/size][/center]
author: InsanePlumber
